resources.string: "GPS enable apps to use GPS on the phone to pinpoint your location. Data connection enable apps to access mobile network. Bluetooth enable to share files to other devicesover short distances. WI-FI enable apps to exchange data or connect to the internet wirelessly. Auto rotation enable to totate screen according to the orientation of the device. If the device keeps inactivity for a period, device will enter the sleep mode. If set on, system will auto-sync data. Set automatic brightness or special brightness."
Turn off some of these settings above may reduce the electricity consumer.
Turn on the switch to stop apps to self-start may reduce the electricity consumer.
Turn on the switch to disable the mobile data connection of apps, may reduce the electricity consumer.
Turn on the switch to restrict background mobile data of apps , may reduce the electricity consumer.
Turn off the switch to stop apps to show notifications may reduce the electricity consumer.
Press button to free up unused memory and may kill background apps, in order to improve the running speed of the phone
Apps selected below ,will not be killed when using memory cleaner.
Auto kill the background apps may reduce the electricity consumer.
You have finished all battery saver guide. You are now ready to enjoy your device.
"Data connection is disable for '%1$s' You can turn on the data connections for this app in 'Disable data connection'."
"Disable mobile data connection ? This feature may cause the apps that depend on mobile data connection to stop working. Disable all data connection?"
"Restrict mobile background data? This feature may cause the apps that depend on mobile background data to stop working when only mobile networks are available. Restrict all mobile background data?"
"Turn off all notification? If you turn off notifications for all apps,you may miss some important alerts and updates. Turn off all notifications?"
